footer.donation:
Donations for the server costs of the WirtBot website are appreciated and accepted via Ethereum address 
0x39DF85776c626117B945afECF08C4DD262817522

firstUse.pleaseAddConfig: Please paste the initial config provided by the WirtBot core

network.title: Network settings
network.dnsName: DNS name to access services in network via their name

dns.title: DNS
dns.ip: IP address of DNS server to use for resolving names
dns.tlsName: Specify the hostname for the DNSoverTLS server
dns.invalidTLSName: Enter the name without any protocols
dns.ignoredZones: DNS zones that should not be forwarded
dns.blockLists: Additional Block Lists to be used

regularBackup.title: Remember to regularly export your backups
regularBackup.text: Because WirtBot never sends your configuration data to anyone your are fully in charge of maintaining backups of your configurations. This is important as you will need these backups to continue work on another computer or restore your work in case something goes wrong.

whyNoLogin.title: Why don't I need to login?
whyNoLogin.text: Your WirtBot, your browser: Connected with modern cryptography. No need for oldschool things like passwords

settings.imported: Your backup has been imported successfully!
settings.confirmGeneratingKeys: Are you sure you want to regenerate your keys?
settings.confirmGeneratingKeysAgain: Make absolutely sure you know what you are doing! This can lock you out of your server forever if you did not set it up yourself!
settings.fileReaderApiNotSupported: It seems that your browser does not support the FileReader API. Please configure WirtBot on another browser using your backup to continue where you left off
settings.noFileSelected: No file was selected to import.

errors.backupNotCompatible: The backup has a newer version than the app and is not comptaible
errors.backupUpgradeTo1dot0: Error when upgrading your backup from beta version to 1.0
errors.copyFailed: Could not copy, please do it manually.
errors.deviceIpUsed: Error when adding Device: The IP is already used in the network. Please choose another one.
errors.deviceIpServer: Error when adding Device: IP number 1 belongs to the server
errors.deviceMTU: Please add an MTU between 1320 and 1800
errors.deviceAdditionalDNSServers: Please enter a comma separated list of DNS server IPs
errors.documentation: Please check the documentation or contact us to find a solution.
errors.fileReaderApiNotSupported: Your browser does not seem to support the FileReader API. Read more at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/File
errors.noFileSelected: Please select a file to import first.
errors.updateFail: Failed to talk to API. Are you sure that the API Endpoint is set correctly?
errors.failedToParseInitialData: Error parsing the provided data. Please make sure you copied it from your WirtBot Core correctly
errors.cors: Could not update. Correct origin allowed in the Core?
errors.signature: Incorrect Signature. Did you persist your public key in the Core?
